description: An elderly woman is seated inside the basket of a shopping cart being pushed by another elderly woman at a checkout counter. The cashier addresses the customer, noting she has forgotten something again. The specific situation presents an absurd scenario where the most obvious and unusual element, the person in the cart, is overlooked in favor of a mundane comment about forgetfulness. This highlights the irony of focusing on minor details while ignoring the strikingly surreal.
caption: “Oh, Mrs. Oswald ... you’ve forgotten something again.”
